display_long_description:
The Frenzy Virus has mutated, unleashing a new wave of chaos. You and your team must now confront hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction. Immerse yourself in a fast-paced, action-packed VR experience where survival hinges on your ability to adapt, upgrade, and overpower relentless enemies.
[media]
# Key Features:
**Intense Horde Survival Gameplay**

Engage in thrilling, physics-based combat against waves of mutated monsters. Each enemy is designed with unique abilities and behaviors, keeping you on your toes as you fight for survival.
[media]
**Upgrade and Customize**

Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. 
[media]
**Diverse and Immersive Maps**

Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more! 
[media]
**Epic Boss Battles**

Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 
[media]
**Multiplayer Mayhem**

Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract. 
[media]
**Progression and Customization**

Gather scrap, a permanent currency, to unlock new weapons and upgrades at your home base. Persistently enhance your character across play sessions, becoming stronger and more versatile with each run.

# Key Features:
**Intense Horde Survival Gameplay**

Engage in thrilling, physics-based combat against waves of mutated monsters. Each enemy is designed with unique abilities and behaviors, keeping you on your toes as you fight for survival.
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982499_874210870844905_8266732701765703080_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=zng9VaHWipEQ7kNvwFkPZvL&_nc_oc=AdldOkU8zuPoWBHR3mevjzYkRk5nv_WfjzMtNrfn4Bqw14bZcAssxpoDNiskxXqxlYM&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=hx-2JWO7YOGLenAnpdpW2w&oh=00_AfE_vEXgiUX2ew4lK-UWvEYgvv8mY7XrJMaTQ-rUDLiMAw&oe=68009749)
**Upgrade and Customize**

Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. 
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75416840_1360911681979177_4029700482968298444_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=QkIgKRl97OsQ7kNvwFqf4-w&_nc_oc=AdnzU7OlMesz07fzyFAVQMjMJQ0hWRDvoiixoSCW-iZw0ssMiRdDkhoNtVjPGUzhvSg&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=hx-2JWO7YOGLenAnpdpW2w&oh=00_AfGwDdacp5RcHfViNaM87AVuyDsLJNxvSwUuRiWE-I2eEw&oe=68009561)
**Diverse and Immersive Maps**

Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more! 
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982581_1223888319033072_3959488854512735737_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=6OKkaN6p4N8Q7kNvwECeLK5&_nc_oc=Adl0zl2Yus_YihBbWoI8DxRFDsh7y_2UgSTlpZLm8j_E2-4aK4x_O9xbCqbgb_jDEo0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=hx-2JWO7YOGLenAnpdpW2w&oh=00_AfEaShVQ9FHZyLJ5NJN-vn8x9R8HTglgYcjLqHttKgbi2Q&oe=6800A49D)
**Epic Boss Battles**

Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974548_1040387177540093_112250259871580574_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=SJy7rNXr2tsQ7kNvwFRAEux&_nc_oc=Adkpnu9UscO-RxX22aH8KGEt_6UV0cUv-looaSEVmHnVTlzwFKYHVicviTwzw1NWfxw&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=hx-2JWO7YOGLenAnpdpW2w&oh=00_AfELv6funiy9y7vV5_X3OwZsyuaS11BByRq3xliCHzjCFA&oe=68009252)
**Multiplayer Mayhem**

Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract. 
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974628_1432121104166417_7819473213702105902_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=6vRd05GGUcEQ7kNvwG9YtKb&_nc_oc=AdleDeyevdy3W-_idPuRBom4p8B-I4GXUZklL_6E_OoQxoEEAvc4qtPdQu69XHG4MWg&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=hx-2JWO7YOGLenAnpdpW2w&oh=00_AfG6-lq-F06Pr9jmUeEICB8ANxSvdkYSwBfOSxzsKklEJg&oe=6800AC82)
**Progression and Customization**

Gather scrap, a permanent currency, to unlock new weapons and upgrades at your home base. Persistently enhance your character across play sessions, becoming stronger and more versatile with each run.
